definition: one's share of a gift price
classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
gift money (on the occasion of a wedding etc)
to pool resources (for a gift, project etc)
to club together (to offer a gift)/to hold a whip-round

sentences.english: For human-rights activists and sympathizers of the Dalai Lama in Western countries, their actions can be called a failure.
sentences.chinese: 人权份子和西方哒赖的同情者们的举动是失败的。

sentences.english: This subject surveys the main currents of European cultural and intellectual history in the modern period.
sentences.chinese: 本科目概括当代欧洲文化与知识份子历史的主要思潮。

sentences.english: Students often go Dutch in these restaurants on weekends.
sentences.chinese: 周末，学生常凑份子去这些饭馆吃饭。

sentences.english: Tom took a cut from all the business they pull.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆从他们拉的生意中抽份子。

sentences.english: He's a racist and an anti - Semite and a prick.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个种族主义和反犹份子和刺痛。

sentences.english: If Plato is a fascist, ? what does that make you?
sentences.chinese: 如果柏拉图是一名法西斯份子，那你们又该如何自称？

sentences.english: Nine terrorists were captured by Malian forces.
sentences.chinese: 马里军队俘虏了九名恐怖份子。

sentences.english: As I see it, pirates should be treated like terrorists.
sentences.chinese: 依我之见，海盗应当被当作恐怖份子来对待。

sentences.english: This is no different then not fighting terror groups, the threat makes you back off.
sentences.chinese: 这和恐吓恐怖份子一样，就是要在气势上吓退对方。

sentences.english: Polymermicroporous filter tubes are installed inside the cylindrical shellvertically.
sentences.chinese: 高份子微孔过滤管铅直装在圆柱形壳体内。

sentences.english: We had a whip-round for Annie's leaving present.
sentences.chinese: 我们凑份子给安妮买了离别礼物。

sentences.english: Apparently, the White House thinks that the Foreign Office is full of pinkos and traitors.
sentences.chinese: 白宫认为外交部都是些左倾份子和卖国贼。

sentences.english: Yet these organizations mastered the same technical skills as the right-wingers.
sentences.chinese: 而这些组织掌握着和右翼保守份子一样的技术手段。

sentences.english: Galileo called the old strutting Aristotelian conservatives, The Pigeon League.
sentences.chinese: 伽利略称趾高气扬的亚斯多德派保守份子为鸽盟。

sentences.english: Sure, Mrs. Tasker. What were you doing with the international terrorist…Carlos the Jackal, taking dictation?
sentences.chinese: 达斯克太太，那你是替国际恐怖份子卡洛斯做速记吗？

sentences.english: Let us do a whip-round to buy a joint present for Mary's birthday?
sentences.chinese: 我们一起凑份子给玛丽买份生日礼物吧？

definition: variant of 幫凶|帮凶[bang1 xiong1]
those on our side/ourselves/one's own people/one of us
bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
